professional_summary: Over 14 years of experience in Class II and III medical device manufacturing, molecular diagnostics, and biotechnology, with 8 years managing engineers, technicians, and supervisors. Strong technical leadership with expertise in data analysis and statistics for manufacturing process improvement.

work_experience.description: Managing Quality Engineering Team, Complaints Department, and Metrology Department at Class II and III medical device manufacturing facility
responsibilities: Manage Quality Engineering Team, Complaints Department, and Metrology Department
Improve site compliance and reduce recurring deviations through NCR Investigations
Investigate customer complaints and interface with regulatory groups
Direct teams for Calibration support across two facilities
Provide leadership and development for direct reports

work_experience.description: Managed Process Engineering and Automation Groups for Class II/III surgically implantable optic device manufacturing
responsibilities: Led Process Engineering and Automation Groups
Implemented automation projects with 1-3 year payback periods
